Daman, what's your recommended best compression/conversion methodology?

I have the complete 1080P BD Dual-Audio rip of Angel Beats, with each episode coming in at roughly 700 Mb's -- a file size I honestly don't need -- What's the best way to compress these files and get the best compromise of quality and size? As most of your 720P's are around 300 Mb's, which is the ideal file size I would wish to achieve.
Lost leaf Using 10bit will Drop the File size by 50-100MB, Also Lowering the Audio from 5.1 to 2.0 Stereo 128Kbps will also lower the File size considerably.
